# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#23)

#### Sweetness

Were the Ryshadium artificially enhanced or created, or were they natural?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Oh, RAFO! Good question!
